1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Keitha,
Thank you for reaching out today! I hope to work with you in the near future. I have included some information for your review that you can access by following the link below:
http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html
If you have any additional questions about our services please feel free to contact me or follow the link below to schedule another time to speak on my calendar:

Thanks again and I look forward to speaking with you soon! Nicolette
